biotools.summary: Integrates information on RNA helicases. The database allows retrieval of comprehensive information on sequence, structure and on biochemical and cellular functions of all RNA helicases from the most widely used model organisms Escherichia coli, Saccharomyces cerevisiae, Caenorhabditis elegans, Drosophila melanogaster, mouse and human. The database is structured according to the most recent helicase classification into helicase superfamilies and families, emphasizes phyologenetic relations.
